mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscriptions (user_id, endpoint, p256dh, auth) VALUES (#{userId}, #{endpoint}, #{p256dh}, #{auth})
mapper.select: SELECT endpoint, p256dh, auth FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT users.id AS userId, users.role, s.endpoint, s.p256dh, s.auth FROM users JOIN subscriptions s ON users.id = s.user_id WHERE users.role = 'Manager'
